issue.title: Make it easier to delete multi-pills

content.raw: It would also be nice to be able to delete all the pills from a specific run, that is, all the pills with the same number suffix (`_1`, `_2`...). If you're running the same experiment multiple times, you might want to discard only some of the experiments to make the graph less crowded.
content.html: It would also be nice to be able to delete all the pills from a specific run, that is, all the pills with the same number suffix (_1, _2...). If you're running the same experiment multiple times, you might want to discard only some of the experiments to make the graph less crowded.
